mapper.select:
select loginuser.ID, loginuser.EMP_ID, loginuser.USER_ID, loginuser.USER_NAME, loginuser.PASSWORD, loginuser.STATUS, loginuser.MENU_TYPE, loginuser.CREATE_DATE, loginuser.UPDATE_USERID, loginuser.APP_ID, loginuser.USER_COMMENT, loginuser.VALID_STARTDATE, loginuser.VALID_ENDDATE, case when USER_STATIS.failed_count is null then 0 else USER_STATIS.failed_count end as failed_count, case when USER_STATIS.success_count is null then 0 else USER_STATIS.success_count end as success_count from t_gf_loginuser loginuser left join ( select case when mcselect1.USER_NAME is null then mcselect2.USER_NAME else mcselect1.USER_NAME end as USER_NAME, mcselect1.failed_count, mcselect2.success_count from ( select distinct mclog.USER_NAME, count(mclog.status) as failed_count from MC_CONSUME_LOG mclog where mclog.status = '1' group by mclog.USER_NAME, mclog.STATUS ) mcselect1 full join ( select distinct mclog.USER_NAME, count(mclog.status) as success_count from MC_CONSUME_LOG mclog where mclog.status = '0' group by mclog.USER_NAME, mclog.STATUS ) mcselect2 on mcselect1.USER_NAME = mcselect2.USER_NAME ) USER_STATIS on loginuser.user_id = USER_STATIS.user_name
loginuser.USER_NAME LIKE '%${userName}%'
and loginuser.USER_ID like '%${userId}%'
